email.subject: Pleasure doing business
email.body: Thanks! It should only take me a moment to set everything up. I'll contact you when it's ready. This is only my first real project, so I'm a little bit nervous... I mean, I'm sure it will work, but this kind of stuff isn't so easily testable in artificial conditions. There might be a part of my theories where I'm wrong, and I'll have to fix it. I'm just rambling now; you don't need to hear this. I'll be done in a jiffy.
